fields.name: Perri
fields.description: Perri works for a travel magazine, and loves going to new places! By plane, ferry or train - Perri also enjoys the journey too

fields.name: Carroto
fields.description: A cool carrot, Carroto loves long motorbike rides by the sea, leather jackets and sunglasses. But he has a soft side too!

fields.name: Cherrin
fields.description: Funny and charming, Cherrin loves making jokes and watching comedies!

fields.name: Brocco
fields.description: Always active, Brocco usually gets up early with the sunrise!

fields.name: Banoffi
fields.description: A lover of crafts, Banoffi can make all kinds of things!

fields.name: Carroto's Carrot Cake
fields.description: Take a bite of this classic, moist carrot cake with our cool guy, Carroto on top of the icing!

fields.name: Cherrin Shirley Temple
fields.description: Cool off with this delicious take on the classic Shirley Temple - topped off with a maraschino cherry cut to look like Cherrin

fields.name: Brocco's Broccoli Cheesebake
fields.description: A filling creamy and cheesy broccoli cheesebake that Brocco adores

fields.name: Banoffi Smoothie
fields.description: Enjoy the creamy and nutritious smoothie with banana and coconut!

fields.name: Perri's Chicken Caesar Salad
fields.description: Perri's favourite meal - a chicken caesar salad topped off with croutons, cherry tomatoes, and caesar dressing

fields.name: Perri Mug
fields.description: Enjoy a delicious drink in this cute mug featuring Perri!

fields.name: Perri Keychain
fields.description: Add sparkle to your bag or outfit with this adorable acrylic keychain featuring Perri
fields.details: Size without strap approx 5cm (H) x 8cm (W) x 0.5cm (D)

fields.name: Perri Tumbler
fields.description: This will soon become a favourite for any drink with the sparkle added by Perri

fields.name: Carroto Mug
fields.description: Be as cool as Carroto every morning with this mug!

fields.name: Carroto Keychain
fields.description: An acrylic keychain featuring Carroto
fields.details: Size without strap approx 5cm (H) x 8cm (W) x 0.5cm (D)

fields.name: Carroto Utensils
fields.description: Brighten every meal with this Carroto cutlery set
fields.details: Features one knife, fork and spoon approx 18cm length each

fields.name: Cherrin Mug
fields.description: Have a nice cup of jo from this cute mug with Cherri

fields.name: Cherrin Utensils
fields.description: Brighten every meal with this Cherrin cutlery set
fields.details: Features one knife, fork and spoon approx 18cm length each

fields.name: Cherrin Badge
fields.description: Perfect to add cuteness to your badge or outfit
fields.details: Badge has safety-pin backing; size 50mm diameter

fields.description: This will soon become a favourite for any drink with the sparkle added by Banoffi
